titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NUMBER OF NODES POSITIVE (PARA-AORTIC) - Description

div.p: NUMBER OF NODES POSITIVE (PARA-AORTIC) is the number of para-aortic nodes (the lymph nodes that lie in front of the lumbar vertebral bodies near the aorta) reported as being positive for theÂ presence of Tumour metastases during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell.
